name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38207381

You ready your buckler, sliding down the ropes to the bottom of the chasm with Tatsumaki at your side and Aelriss following after. You hit the stone floor below you, crunching on bones, and immediately dart forward, sweeping the torch up into your shield hand, preparing to swing at whatever emerges from the darkness.

> [[ Underground: Vos's Lair // Neutral Territory // PVP Enabled ]]

You notice it's wet below you, the bones and rocks sitting atop an inch-deep layer of stagnant water and ancient mud.

“Bug!” You hear Tatsumaki's voice. There's a hideous buzzing from your right, in the darkness, and you cast your light over something moving toward you, just in time.

“Oh, shit! What are these?!” Aelriss shouts from behind you.

> Step back, buckler up.
> Dodge.
> Thrust to intercept.
